name: FACEmeeting
tag_list: webrtc, rtcweb, face-to-face, virtual, video-conferencing, web-meetings
description: Open cloud. No downloads. BYOD. Mobile.
overview: FACEmeeting is pursuing a unique opportunity based on the emergence of standard communications capabilities in devices through WebRTC and HTML5. FACEmeeting is using these technologies to build an open communications platform based on a simple video meeting offer that enables users to start with a simple video and then add collaboration tools and capabilities to expand the meeting. Open cloud. No downloads. BYOD. Mobile. Secure. Scalable. Cost efficient.
